courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: Branch of computer science that deals with the design, development, testing, and maintenance of software applications

courses.title: Robotics
courses.description: A branch of engineering and computer science that involves the conception, design, manufacture and operation of robots

courses.title: Business Intelligence
courses.description: Technical infrastructure that collects, stores, and analyzes company data.

courses.title: Marketing
courses.description: Business activities associated with communicating, advertising, delivering, or selling products or services to customers

courses.title: Financial Engineering
courses.description: Interdisciplinary branch of the investment industry that makes use of applied mathematics, statistics, computer science, financial theory, and economics to conduct quantitative analysis on the financial markets
